amendment.description: An amendment numbered 82 printed in House Report 114-683 to prohibit funds from being used to finalize, implement, administer or enforce EPA's proposed rule on Accidental Release Prevention Requirements: Rink Management Program Under the Clean Air Act.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 82 printed in House Report 114-683 to prohibit funds from being used to finalize, implement, administer or enforce EPA's proposed rule on Accidental Release Prevention Requirements: Rink Management Program Under the Clean Air Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Pompeo amendment (A068) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Pompeo amendment (A068) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A068) offered by Mr. Pompeo.
